ddl_create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS oasisreport (xmlns TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (xmlns));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messageheader (source TEXT, timedate TEXT, version TEXT, oasisreport_xmlns TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_xmlns) REFERENCES oasisreport(xmlns), PRIMARY KEY (source, timedate, version));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messagepayload (id TEXT, oasisreport_xmlns TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_xmlns) REFERENCES oasisreport(xmlns), PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rto (name TEXT, messagepayload_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (messagepayload_id) REFERENCES messagepayload(id), PRIMARY KEY (name));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_item (id TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_header (report TEXT, tz TEXT, system TEXT, mkt_type TEXT, uom TEXT, sec_per_interval INTEGER, interval TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (report, tz, system, mkt_type, uom, sec_per_interval, interval));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_data (opr_date TEXT, renewable_type TEXT, interval_num INTEGER, data_item TEXT, interval_start_gmt TEXT, id TEXT, trading_hub TEXT, interval_end_gmt TEXT, value INTEGER, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (opr_date, renewable_type, data_item, interval_num, interval_start_gmt, id, trading_hub, interval_end_gmt, value));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disclaimer_item (disclaimer TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (disclaimer));
description: Forecast and actual wind and solar generation by hour. Aggregated by trading
hub (NP15, ZP26, and SP15). Day-Ahead forecast is posted daily in advance of
the Day-Ahead Market, Hour-Ahead forecast is posted in advance of each HASP
market. RTPD forecast is posted in advance of each RTPD market run by 15-minute
intervals. RTD forecast is posted in advance of each RTD run by 5-minute
intervals. Actual production is posted the day after the operating day. Note:
to ensure a high level of accuracy only Eligible Intermittent Resources (EIR),
including those that participate in the Participating Intermittent Resource
program (PIRP) are included in the report.
The forecast MW value for each hour of the Operating Day, posted in the morning
the day before the each markets run
The trading hub name. Valid values are NP15,SP15,ZP26 and ALL
Renewable Type include one of the following - “Wind” (Include: Wind PIRP & EIR
name: data-oasis-sld-ren-fcst-dam
